title: Banana choc nut loaf
ingredients: ['120g butter', '120g light brown sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 eggs, beaten', '3 over ripe or ripe bananas, mashed', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '220g plain flour', '50g to 80g chocolate chips (dark preferable)', 'flaked almonds or other chopped nuts, to taste (optional)', '3 tablespoons water (if needed)']
